mcq.statement: Identity correct statement: Elemental Na is easily oxidizing, Element sodium can be prepared and isolated by electrolyzing an aqueous solution of NaCl, Element Na is strong oxidizing agent, Elemental Na is insoluble in NH3

options.b: Element sodium can be prepared and isolated by electrolyzing an aqueous solution of NaCl
options.c: Element Na is strong oxidizing agent
options.d: Elemental Na is insoluble in NH3
